verses.verse: כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All הַמִּצְוָ֗ה <S%H4687><s%> ham-mitz-Vah, All the commandments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֧י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I am מְצַוְּךָ֛ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom thee this day תִּשְׁמְר֣וּן <S%H8104><s%> tish-me-Run shall ye observe לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot; to do לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an that תִּֽחְי֜וּן <S%H2421><s%> tich-Yun that ye may live וּרְבִיתֶ֗ם <S%H7235><s%> u-re-vi-Tem, and multiply וּבָאתֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> u-va-Tem and go in וִֽירִשְׁתֶּ֣ם <S%H3423><s%> vi-rish-Tem and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' sware יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-tei-Chem. unto your fathers

וְזָכַרְתָּ֣ <S%H2142><s%> ve-za-char-Ta And thou shalt remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַדֶּ֗רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech, all the way אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הֹלִֽיכֲךָ֜ <S%H1980><s%> ho-li-cha-Cha has led יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh these אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im thee these forty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an might עַנֹּֽתְךָ֜ <S%H6031><s%> 'an-no-te-Cha to humble לְנַסֹּֽתְךָ֗ <S%H5254><s%> le-nas-so-te-Cha, thee [and] to prove לָדַ֜עַת <S%H3045><s%> la-Da-'at thee to know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what בִּֽלְבָבְךָ֛ <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-ve-Cha what [was] in thine heart הֲתִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> ha-tish-Mor whether thou wouldest keep; מִצְוֹתֹו mitz-vo-tov כמִצְוֹתָ֖יו <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tav commanded קאִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- or לֹֽא׃ <S%H3808><s%> Lo. not

וַֽיְעַנְּךָ֮ <S%H6031><s%> vay-'an-ne-Cha And he humbled וַיַּרְעִבֶךָ֒ <S%H7456><s%> vai-yar-'i-ve-Cha thee and suffered thee to hunger וַיַּֽאֲכִֽלְךָ֤ <S%H398><s%> vai-ya-'a-chil-Cha and fed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמָּן֙ <S%H4478><s%> ham-Man thee with manna אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta, which thou knewest וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor יָדְע֖וּן <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'Un know אֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha; not neither did thy fathers לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of הוֹדִֽעֲךָ֗ <S%H3045><s%> ho-di-'a-Cha, that he might make thee know כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by הַלֶּ֤חֶם <S%H3899><s%> hal-Le-chem by bread לְבַדּוֹ֙ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Do only יִחְיֶ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh doth not live הָֽאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam, that man כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- everything מוֹצָ֥א <S%H4161><s%> mo-Tza but by every [word] that proceedeth פִֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> fi- out of the mouth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD יִחְיֶ֥ה <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh live הָאָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam. doth man

שִׂמְלָ֨תְךָ֜ <S%H8071><s%> sim-La-te-cha Thy raiment לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor בָֽלְתָה֙ <S%H1086><s%> val-Tah waxed not old מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lei-cha, and וְרַגְלְךָ֖ <S%H7272><s%> ve-rag-le-Cha upon thee neither did thy foot לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor בָצֵ֑קָה <S%H1216><s%> va-Tze-kah; swell זֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh these אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im these forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. years

וְיָדַעְתָּ֖ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-da'-Ta Thou shalt also consider עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- in לְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Ve-cha; thine heart כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> Ki, for כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יְיַסֵּ֥ר <S%H3256><s%> ye-yas-Ser chasteneth אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish that as a man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No, his son יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [so] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God מְיַסְּרֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H3256><s%> me-yas-se-Re-ka. chasteneth

וְשָׁ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H8104><s%> ve-Sha-mar-ta, Therefore thou shalt keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְוֹ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> mitz-Vot the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God לָלֶ֥כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to walk בִּדְרָכָ֖יו <S%H1870><s%> bid-ra-Chav in his ways וּלְיִרְאָ֥ה <S%H3372><s%> u-le-yir-'Ah and to fear אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki For יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God מְבִֽיאֲךָ֖ <S%H935><s%> me-vi-'a-Cha bringeth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz land טוֹבָ֑ה <S%H2896><s%> to-Vah; thee into a good אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz a land נַ֣חֲלֵי <S%H5158><s%> Na-cha-lei of brooks מָ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, of water עֲיָנֹת֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'a-ya-Not of fountains וּתְהֹמֹ֔ת <S%H8415><s%> u-te-ho-Mot, and depths יֹצְאִ֥ים <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Im that spring out בַּבִּקְעָ֖ה <S%H1237><s%> bab-bik-'Ah of valleys וּבָהָֽר׃ <S%H2022><s%> u-va-Har. and hills

אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz A land חִטָּה֙ <S%H2406><s%> chit-Tah of wheat וּשְׂעֹרָ֔ה <S%H8184><s%> u-se-'o-Rah, and barley וְגֶ֥פֶן <S%H1612><s%> ve-Ge-fen and vines וּתְאֵנָ֖ה <S%H8384><s%> u-te-'e-Nah and fig trees וְרִמּ֑וֹן <S%H7416><s%> ve-rim-Mon; and pomegranates אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> 'e-retz- a land זֵ֥ית <S%H2132><s%> zeit olive שֶׁ֖מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men of oil וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> u-de-Vash. and honey

אֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, A land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher wherein לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo without בְמִסְכֵּנֻת֙ <S%H4544><s%> ve-mis-ke-Nut scarceness תֹּֽאכַל־ <S%H398><s%> to-chal- thou shalt eat בָּ֣הּ bah לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem, bread לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- without תֶחְסַ֥ר <S%H2637><s%> tech-Sar thou shalt not lack כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol anything בָּ֑הּ Bah; אֶ֚רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz any [thing] in it a land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose אֲבָנֶ֣יהָ <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nei-ha whose stones בַרְזֶ֔ל <S%H1270><s%> var-Zel, [are] iron וּמֵהֲרָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H2042><s%> u-me-ha-ra-Rei-ha and out of whose hills תַּחְצֹ֥ב <S%H2672><s%> tach-Tzo thou mayest dig נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. brass

וְאָכַלְתָּ֖ <S%H398><s%> ve-'a-chal-Ta When thou hast eaten וְשָׂבָ֑עְתָּ <S%H7646><s%> ve-sa-Va-'e-ta; and art full וּבֵֽרַכְתָּ֙ <S%H1288><s%> u-ve-rach-Ta then thou shalt bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz land הַטֹּבָ֖ה <S%H2896><s%> hat-to-Vah for the good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נָֽתַן־ <S%H5414><s%> na-tan- which he hath given לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <S%H8104><s%> hish-Sha-mer Beware לְךָ֔ le-Cha, פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- not תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <S%H7911><s%> tish-Kach that thou forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh not the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God לְבִלְתִּ֨י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti not שְׁמֹ֤ר <S%H8104><s%> she-Mor in not keeping מִצְוֹתָיו֙ <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tav his commandments וּמִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו <S%H4941><s%> u-mish-pa-Tav and his judgments וְחֻקֹּתָ֔יו <S%H2708><s%> ve-chuk-ko-Tav, and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom. thee this day

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- otherwise תֹּאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> to-Chal Lest [when] thou hast eaten וְשָׂבָ֑עְתָּ <S%H7646><s%> ve-sa-Va-'e-ta; and art full וּבָתִּ֥ים <S%H1004><s%> u-vat-Tim houses טוֹבִ֛ים <S%H2896><s%> to-Vim goodly תִּבְנֶ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> tiv-Neh and hast built וְיָשָֽׁבְתָּ׃ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-Sha-ve-ta. and dwelt

וּבְקָֽרְךָ֤ <S%H1241><s%> u-ve-ka-re-Cha And [when] thy herds וְצֹֽאנְךָ֙ <S%H6629><s%> ve-tzo-ne-Cha and thy flocks יִרְבְּיֻ֔ן <S%H7235><s%> yir-be-Yun, multiply וְכֶ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> ve-Che-sef and thy silver וְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> ve-za-Hav and thy gold יִרְבֶּה־ <S%H7235><s%> yir-beh- is multiplied לָּ֑ךְ Lach; וְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after לְךָ֖ le-Cha יִרְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H7235><s%> yir-Beh. and all that thou hast is multiplied

וְרָ֖ם <S%H7311><s%> ve-Ram be lifted up לְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Ve-cha; Then thine heart וְשָֽׁכַחְתָּ֙ <S%H7911><s%> ve-sha-chach-Ta and thou forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God הַמּוֹצִיאֲךָ֛ <S%H3318><s%> ham-mo-tzi-'a-Cha which brought thee forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit from the house עֲבָדִֽים׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim. of bondage

הַמּוֹלִ֨יכֲךָ֜ <S%H1980><s%> ham-mo-Li-cha-cha led בַּמִּדְבָּ֣ר׀ <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar wilderness הַגָּדֹ֣ל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol thee through that great וְהַנּוֹרָ֗א <S%H3372><s%> ve-han-no-Ra, and terrible נָחָ֤שׁ׀ <S%H5175><s%> na-Chash serpents שָׂרָף֙ <S%H8314><s%> sa-Raf [wherein were] fiery וְעַקְרָ֔ב <S%H6137><s%> ve-'ak-Rav, and scorpions וְצִמָּא֖וֹן <S%H6774><s%> ve-tzim-ma-'on and drought אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher where אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- there מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; where [there was] no water הַמּוֹצִ֤יא <S%H3318><s%> ham-mo-Tzi who brought thee forth לְךָ֙ le-Cha מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, water מִצּ֖וּר <S%H6697><s%> mitz-Tzur out of the rock הַֽחַלָּמִֽישׁ׃ <S%H2496><s%> Ha-chal-la-Mish. of flint

הַמַּֽאֲכִ֨לְךָ֥ <S%H398><s%> ham-ma-'a-Chil-cha Who fed מָן֙ <S%H4478><s%> man with manna בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar, thee in the wilderness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not יָדְע֖וּן <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'Un knew אֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-cha; which thy fathers לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an might עַנֹּֽתְךָ֗ <S%H6031><s%> 'an-no-te-Cha, not that he might humble וּלְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> u-le-Ma-'an might נַסֹּתֶ֔ךָ <S%H5254><s%> nas-so-Te-cha, thee and that he might prove לְהֵיטִֽבְךָ֖ <S%H3190><s%> le-hei-tiv-Cha thee to do thee good בְּאַחֲרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H319><s%> be-'a-cha-ri-Te-cha. at thy latter end

וְאָמַרְתָּ֖ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta And thou say בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-Ve-cha; in thine heart כֹּחִי֙ <S%H3581><s%> ko-Chi My power וְעֹ֣צֶם <S%H6108><s%> ve-'O-tzem and the might יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di, of [mine] hand עָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> 'A-sah hath gotten לִ֖י li אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחַ֥יִל <S%H2428><s%> ha-Cha-yil me this wealth הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

וְזָֽכַרְתָּ֙ <S%H2142><s%> ve-za-char-Ta But thou shalt remember אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, who הַנֹּתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> han-no-Ten for [it is] he that giveth לְךָ֛ le-Cha כֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> Ko-ach thee power לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to get חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil; wealth לְמַ֨עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of הָקִ֧ים <S%H6965><s%> ha-Kim that he may establish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִית֛וֹ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-To his covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha unto thy fathers כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> kai-Yom as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this פ Peh
